title: 03/25/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 03/25/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin compares James Harden to a Hall of Famer for all the wrong reasons and why we need to stop falling into the same trap. He also ranks the Browns as the third most talented team in the NFL right now and what that means for quarterback Baker Mayfield. Plus, FOX Sports lead college football analyst Joel Klatt joins the show for a live mock draft with Colin covering the first 16 picks of the NFL draft! 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
